about_the_game: “My House is Haunted” is a first person shooter horror game in which  the player will kill hordes of zombies.

content_descriptors.notes: The content contained in this game may not be suitable for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content, sexual content, nudity, extreme violence.

detailed_description: “My House is Haunted” is a first person shooter horror game in which  the player will kill hordes of zombies.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Big Sur
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630 GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: My House Is Haunted

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64/32Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64/32Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A Vampire Survivor like game but first person shooter. You level up by shooting the enemy and get new skills. Upgrade your skills!
